TopicTitle: Do a simple scan of Mun Crater

Articles.Content:
I was having trouble with this mission.  Here is an attached image if it will help.  Thanks

Also if you know anything about the surface science on Minmus that'd be great too.

deleted

Edited March 29, 2020 by Guest
I figured it out, I allowed partial transmission for my rover so i didn't meet the percentage requirement unless I transmitted with full battery power.

One issue not addressed in this thread is wording in KSP is sometimes VERY specific.  In the image you are scanning a "large Mün crater" vs. just a "Mün crater."  I made this mistake, and wound up here.  Hope this helps any late comers to KSP like myself.
